abstract: Boeing reports third-quarter profit of $1.1 billion, or $1.46 per share, up 31 percent from $837 million, or $1.12 per share, in year-ago quarter; revenue was $17.7 billion, up 4.5 percent from $17 billion.
snippet: On the day the Boeing 787 made its inaugural commercial flight, the company said it would deliver fewer of the new planes this year because of production problems.
lead_paragraph: On the day the Boeing 787 made its inaugural commercial flight, the company said it would deliver fewer of the new planes this year because of production problems.

headline.main: Boeing Posts Strong Profit but Cuts Delivery Forecast
headline.print_headline: Boeing Posts 31% Increase In Net Income
headline.seo: Boeing Posts Strong Profit but Cuts Delivery Forecast
